meanings.sent1: The engagers at the event were actively participating in the discussions.
meanings.sent2: The engagers in the book club always had insightful comments to share.
meanings.sent3: The engagers at the party were the first ones on the dance floor.
meanings.sent4: Her enthusiasm made her one of the most engaging engagers in the group.
meanings.sent5: The engagers in the project were dedicated and committed to its success.

meanings.definition: Devices used to engage or connect two parts together.
meanings.sent1: The engagers in the puzzle helped link the pieces seamlessly.
meanings.sent2: The engagers in the circuit ensured a strong connection between the wires.
meanings.sent3: The tiny engagers in the toy were essential for assembling it correctly.
meanings.sent4: The engagers in the lock mechanism were intricate and precise.
meanings.sent5: The engagers in the machinery were crucial for its smooth operation.
